reviews.text: Stopped here on the way from sc to Ohio. I have OCD so this room was very clean or I would not have stayed here. No smoke smell at all in room 223. Very nice, helpful, and friendly person at the check in counter.
reviews.title: Very friendly and clean room.

reviews.text: This is probably one of the worst hotel experiences I have ever had. The rooms were so/so when is came to cleanliness. The beds were clean but everything else seemed very neglected. Considering we were paying $90/night I expected it to be a little better. My reservation was screwed up when I checked in as they had my name on 4 rooms rather than 2. And now that I am home, I see that my credit card has been charged for 3 rooms rather than two. I was told they have to try and figure out who had the room and try to get a hold of that person to get payment before they will credit me!! I have been trying to get them to reverse the charge for almost a week. No one seems to know what they are doing and no one seems to want to help resolve this issue. I get excuse after excuse. We will be back in Beckley many times in the future for baseball tournaments but I will never stay in this hotel again.
reviews.title: Terrible!

reviews.text: The cleanliness of the rooms seemed very poor, as the bed covers were stained and the mirrored wall above the bed was all dusty with someone else's hair grease left on it. The decor could also use some updating, as it looked like they used a poopy brown color-scheme. The rooms are apparently non-smoking, but the whole upstair hallway reeked of smoke. I would not recommend staying here. I certainly would not stay here again.
reviews.title: The rooms definitely don't seem clean.

We are a 64 room, 100% SMOKE FREE hotel with a heated indoor pool, fitness room, free cont. breakfast and more.We are located only minutes from Winterplace Ski resort, numerous restaurants and shopping.
